name: es9018k2m
description: Hardware control for ES9018K2M DAC via I2C with automatic volume synchronization
author: Volumio Team

volumio_info.details: Hardware control for ES9018K2M DAC via I2C. Automatic volume synchronization with Volumio, digital filters (FIR/IIR), DPLL jitter reduction, balance control, and pre-compiled device tree overlays for boards with and without onboard oscillators.
volumio_info.changelog: v1.0.0 - Initial release with integrated volume sync, no external dependencies
